overview:
David has been involved in the video game industry since 1983. He is well known for his past company (DMA Design Ltd.) and for his catalogue of hit games. Over the years David has written and designed over 15 games, most notably two global hit franchises which still sell today. Lemmings, with sales of over 20 million across 20 formats, and Grand Theft Auto with sales of over 50 million.

After a merger and successful IPO with Gremlin Group PLC, and subsequent take over by Infogrames, David left to pursue a new goal. Currently creating what he believes will be the first mass market on-line video game.
